thread.title: For the U.S., kicking out Russian spies may not be enough

title: For the U.S., kicking out Russian spies may not be enough
text:
For the U.S., kicking out Russian spies may not be enough 11:04am BST - 01:58 
As the U.S. conducts its biggest post-Cold War expulsion of Russian diplomats, who they brand intelligence officials, they are dealing with a different cadre of Russian spies than in the past. Reuters' Jonathan Landay explains why.   
As the U.S. conducts its biggest post-Cold War expulsion of Russian diplomats, who they brand intelligence officials, they are dealing with a different cadre of Russian spies than in the past. Reuters' Jonathan Landay explains why.  //reut.rs/2pM5EsA
